themes: concerns about sustainability of grant funding
limits on the number of grants per organization
opposition to for-profit access to HOT funding
key_phrases: evaluate the success and sustainability of the THRIVE program
feel abandoned and/or betrayed when that money is not renewed
city can not support 35 groups every year at the $150,000 level forever
for profit groups should not have access to HOT funding
screen so that one organization can not get 4 or 5 grants from THRIVE and Elevate
thank you so much for asking for our opinions
barriers_identified: lack of sustained funding for grantees
potential for-profit competition for HOT funding
inequitable distribution of grants to single organizations
solutions_proposed: evaluate the success and sustainability of the THRIVE program
screen so that one organization can not get 4 or 5 grants from THRIVE and Elevate
exclude for-profit groups from HOT funding
